scripts.build: npm run build-es-backup-scheduler && npm run build-es-snapshot-validate-state && npm run build-es-snapshot-restore
scripts.build-es-backup-scheduler: cd src/es-backup-scheduler && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build-es-snapshot-validate-state: cd src/es-snapshot-validate-state && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build-es-snapshot-restore: cd src/es-snapshot-restore && npm run build && cd ../../
